required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Characteristics and Treatment Trends of Young Breast Cancer in China
clinical_study.official_title: An Study on the Trend of Change and Influencing Factors of Clinicopathologic Characteristics, Diagnosis and Treatment Pattern, and Survival Status of Young Breast Cancer in China

brief_summary.textblock: To describe the clinical characteristics, the diagnosis and treatment, the survival status and change trend of young breast cancer patients in China from 2000 to 2015, and to explore and discuss the main influencing factors.

detailed_description.textblock: In this study, medical records and follow-up information of young breast cancer patients (age ≤35 years at first diagnosis) who were first diagnosed and treated in the years (2000, 2003, 2006, 2009, 2012 and 2015) were collected from multiple hospitals in China from 2000 to 2015, to establish a retrospective cohort of young breast cancer patients. Clinical characteristics, diagnosis and treatment, and survival rates of young breast cancer patients from 2000 to 2015 were analyzed. To explore the main factors affecting the clinical diagnosis and treatment and the survival of patients.

primary_outcome.description: To describe the clinical characteristics and trends of young breast cancer patients in China
To describe the methods of diagnosis and treatment in young breast cancer patients in China and the changing trend, to explore the main factors affecting diagnosis and treatment
To describe the survival and change trend of young breast cancer patients in China, to explore the main factors affecting the prognosis of young breast cancer patients

arm_group.description: Young breast cancer patients in China from 2000 to 2015, of whom the clinical features, diagnosis and treatment models and survival status are described.

intervention.intervention_name: Clinical characteristics, diagnosis and treatment, survival status
intervention.description: Describe the clinical characteristics, diagnosis and treatment, survival status and the trends of young breast cancer
intervention.other_name: This is a retrospective study to observe and describe the diagnosis and treatment of previous young breast cancer patients without intervention

study_pop.textblock: Young Breast cancer patients (≤35 years old) in China

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Young Breast cancer patients (≤35 years old) in China
Exclusion Criteria:
- Breast cancer patients (>35 years old) in China
